de.engehausen.treemap.examples.swt

Class FilterDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.engehausen.treemap.examples.swt.FilterDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IColorProvider<FileInfo,Color>, java.io.Serializable

    public class FilterDialog
extends java.lang.Object
implements IColorProvider<FileInfo,Color>, java.io.Serializable
    Color dialog used in FileViewer which allows to map colors to file names and directory names based on regular expressions (see Pattern). The dialog directly acts as a IColorProvider to colorButton nodes of the tree map. PRETTY UGLY
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
